trans-unit.source: Derivative of <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.DependencyObjectValidator"></xref> that is a base class for all activity validator components.
trans-unit.target: Derivativo di <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.DependencyObjectValidator"> </xref> che rappresenta una classe base per tutti i componenti di convalida di attività.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ActivityValidator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ActivityValidator"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the given activity is valid.
trans-unit.target: Verifica che l'attività specificata è valida.

trans-unit.source: This method calls <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator.ValidateProperties%2A> to validate the properties of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator.ValidateProperties%2A>per convalidare le proprietà di <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator.ValidateProperties%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method only validates the uniqueness of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A> for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> if the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> is not a root <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo convalida solo l'unicità del <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A>per il <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>non è una radice <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection"></xref> object that contains any errors or warnings that occurred during validation.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection"> </xref> oggetto che contiene gli errori o avvisi che si è verificato durante la convalida.
